# removeItem(withTitle:)

**Instance Method**

Removes the item with the specified title from the menu.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func removeItem(withTitle title: String)
```

## Parameters

- **title**: The title of the item you want to remove. If no menu item exists with the specified title, this method triggers an assertion.

## Adding and removing items

- **addItem(withTitle:)**: Adds an item with the specified title to the end of the menu.
- **addItems(withTitles:)**: Adds multiple items to the end of the menu.
- **insertItem(withTitle:at:)**: Inserts an item at the specified position in the menu.
- **removeItem(at:)**: Removes the item at the specified index.
- **removeAllItems()**: Removes all items in the receiver’s item menu.
